hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner for seamless relocations and spotless spaces. Reliable, efficient, and always caring.

getQuote.title: Get Your Moving Quote
getQuote.success: Your quote request has been sent successfully!
getQuote.failure: Failed to send the quote. Please try again later.

about.title: About Us
about.paragraph1: At City Comfort Line, we set the standard for reliable and professional moving and cleaning services across Ottawa and neighbouring cities. Our mission is simple to deliver seamless, stress free solutions that combine convenience, quality, and care.
about.paragraph2: We specialize in residential and commercial moving, move in/move out services, junk removal, and comprehensive cleaning solutions tailored to your needs. Whether it’s a household relocation, office move, or property refresh, our trained team ensures every job is completed safely, efficiently, and with the highest attention to detail.
about.paragraph3: With a strong focus on professionalism, punctuality, and customer satisfaction, City Comfort Line continues to earn the trust of individuals, families, and businesses throughout the region. We take pride in treating every space and every move as if it were our own ensuring our clients experience unmatched comfort and peace of mind.
about.quote: City Comfort Line — Moving You Forward, Cleaning with Care.

ourServices.title: Our Services
ourServices.subtitle: Comprehensive moving and cleaning solutions for your needs

residential.title: Short & Long Distance Moving
residential.content: We handle moves of any distance whether you're relocating across the street or across the country. Local moves offer same day service within the city, while long distance relocations include route planning, GPS tracking, and full insurance coverage. Door to door service with transparent pricing based on distance and volume. No matter how far you're going, we ensure your belongings arrive safely and on time.

apartment.title: Residential & Business Moving
apartment.content: At City Comfort Line, we understand that moving a home is different from relocating a business  each requires specialized care, planning, and expertise. That's why we offer dedicated moving solutions tailored to meet the unique needs of both residential and commercial clients.

office.title: Heavy Equipment Delivery
office.content: City Comfort Line specializes in the safe and efficient delivery of heavy equipment, machinery, and oversized items that require expert handling and specialized transportation. Whether you're a business owner, contractor, property manager, or homeowner, we have the experience, equipment, and trained personnel to move your heavy-duty items with precision and care.

packing.title: Junk Removal Services
packing.content: Declutter your space and reclaim your property with City Comfort Line's professional junk removal services. Whether you're clearing out years of accumulated items, preparing for a move, renovating your home, or simply need to dispose of unwanted belongings, our experienced team handles all the heavy lifting and hauling for you.

furniture.title: Furniture Disassembly & Reassembly
furniture.content: Moving large furniture can be one of the most challenging aspects of any relocation. That's why City Comfort Line offers professional furniture disassembly and reassembly services to ensure your valuable pieces are transported safely and efficiently. Our experienced team knows how to properly take apart and rebuild furniture of all types, from basic bed frames to complex modular systems, saving you time, frustration, and potential damage to your belongings

specialty.title: Specialty Item Moving
specialty.content: Not all belongings are created equal. Some items require extra care, specialized equipment, and expert handling due to their size, weight, fragility, or value. City Comfort Line specializes in moving delicate, oversized, and high value specialty items that demand professional expertise and meticulous attention to detail. Whether it's a priceless family heirloom, expensive musical instrument, or irreplaceable artwork, we treat your most precious possessions with the utmost care and respect they deserve.

internal.title: Internal Moves
internal.content: Not every move involves leaving your property. Sometimes, the best way to refresh your space, improve functionality, or accommodate lifestyle changes is to reorganize and rearrange what you already have. City Comfort Line offers professional internal moving services to help you relocate furniture, equipment, and belongings within your home, office, or building  without the stress, strain, or risk of injury that comes with DIY furniture moving.

local.title: Local & Long-Distance Moves
local.content: Whether you're moving across the street, across the city, or across the country, City Comfort Line provides comprehensive moving services designed to make your relocation seamless, stress free, and efficient. We understand that every move is unique, with its own set of challenges, timelines, and requirements. That's why we offer tailored solutions for both local and long-distance moves, ensuring your belongings are transported safely and arrive on time, no matter the distance.

postMove.title: Office & Small Business Cleaning
postMove.content: Keep your workspace spotless and professional with City Comfort Line’s commercial cleaning services. We deliver reliable, detailed cleaning for offices, retail stores, and medical facilities  creating healthier, more productive environments. Our team handles offices, reception areas, restrooms, floors, windows, and kitchens with daily, weekly, or monthly schedules, plus options for deep, post construction, move in/move out, and disinfection cleaning. Enjoy after hours service, eco friendly products, and trained, consistent staff  all with no long term contracts and transparent pricing. Perfect for offices, clinics, shops, gyms, and salons. Let City Comfort Line keep your business spotless  contact us today for a free quote!

deep.title: Deep Cleaning
deep.content: A detailed, top to bottom cleaning that goes beyond regular maintenance. We sanitize hard to reach areas, remove built up dirt and dust, and restore freshness to your workspace  perfect for quarterly upkeep or preparing for special events.

residential.title: Apartment & Airbnb Cleaning
residential.content: Designed for tenants, landlords, and hosts who need spotless spaces fast. We handle everything from dusting and vacuuming to bathroom and kitchen sanitization, bed making, and restocking essentials. Ideal for move ins, move outs, or preparing your Airbnb for the next guest  leaving every room fresh, clean, and guest ready.

commercial.title: Commercial Cleaning
commercial.content: Keep your business spotless and welcoming with our reliable commercial cleaning services. We clean offices, retail spaces, clinics, and more  from floors and restrooms to windows and workstations. Our flexible schedules, eco-friendly products, and trained professionals ensure a consistent, hygienic environment that enhances productivity and makes a great impression on clients and staff alike.

carpet.title: Carpet & Upholstery Cleaning
carpet.content: Revitalize your space with our professional carpet and upholstery cleaning service. We remove deep-seated dirt, stains, and allergens using safe, effective methods that restore color and freshness. Perfect for offices, apartments, and commercial spaces  leaving your carpets and furniture looking, smelling, and feeling like new.

window.title: Move-In / Move-Out Cleaning
window.content: Make your move stress free with our detailed cleaning service for empty spaces. We scrub, sanitize, and polish every corner  from floors and windows to kitchens and bathrooms  ensuring your old place is spotless and your new one is move in ready. Perfect for tenants, landlords, and property managers who want a fresh start or a flawless handover.

serviceAreas.title: Our Service Areas
serviceAreas.boundary: We proudly serve the entire Ottawa region and surrounding communities.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: At City Comfort Line, we understand that moving and cleaning come with many questions. Below, we've answered some of the most common inquiries to help make your experience as smooth and stress-free as possible.

coverage.question: Where do you provide moving services?
coverage.answer: We provide moving services across Canada, including local and long-distance relocations. Whether you're moving within the same city or across provinces, we've got you covered.

booking.question: How far in advance should I book my move?
booking.answer: We recommend booking your move at least 2-4 weeks in advance to secure your preferred moving date, especially during peak moving seasons (spring and summer). However, we do our best to accommodate last-minute moves whenever possible.

insurance.question: Are you licensed and insured?
insurance.answer: Yes! City Comfort Line is a fully licensed and insured moving company, ensuring the safety of your belongings throughout the entire moving process.

estimate.question: Do you offer free moving estimates?
estimate.answer: Yes! We offer both in-home and virtual estimates to provide you with an accurate moving quote based on your specific needs. Contact us to schedule an assessment.

packing.question: Do you provide packing services and materials?
packing.answer: Yes! We offer comprehensive packing services with a full line of boxes and packing supplies. Our experienced professionals will carefully pack your belongings to ensure they arrive safely at your destination.

emergency.question: Do you handle emergency or last-minute moves?
emergency.answer: Yes! We offer 24/7 emergency services and are available for short notice moves. While we recommend booking in advance, we understand that unexpected situations arise and we'll do our best to accommodate your urgent moving needs.

services.question: What cleaning services do you offer?
services.answer: We offer a comprehensive range of cleaning services including post-move cleaning, deep cleaning, residential cleaning, commercial cleaning, carpet cleaning, and window cleaning. All services are customized to meet your specific needs.

booking.question: How far in advance should I book a cleaning?
booking.answer: We recommend booking your cleaning service at least 1-2 weeks in advance, especially for post-move or deep cleaning services. However, we can often accommodate same-day or next-day cleaning requests based on availability.

supplies.question: Do I need to provide cleaning supplies?
supplies.answer: No, we bring all necessary professional-grade cleaning supplies and equipment. If you have specific product preferences or sensitivities, please let us know in advance and we'll accommodate your needs.

estimate.question: Do you offer free cleaning estimates?
estimate.answer: Yes! We provide free estimates for all our cleaning services. We can assess your space virtually or in-person to give you an accurate quote based on the size of your property and the services required.

products.question: Are your cleaning products eco-friendly?
products.answer: Yes! We use environmentally friendly, non-toxic cleaning products as our standard. These products are safe for children, pets, and those with sensitivities, while still providing exceptional cleaning results.

frequency.question: Do you offer recurring cleaning services?
frequency.answer: Absolutely! We offer flexible cleaning schedules including weekly, bi-weekly, and monthly cleaning plans. Regular clients receive priority scheduling and special rates. We can customize a cleaning schedule that works best for you.
